attributes.action: Stop immigrants illegally crossing the channel to the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
We don't know nothing about they're criminal background which is a threat to our national security, with many illegal immigrants being housed in hotels, making areas of the country a no go zone due to the violence and crime they bring with them. 

In one week we had over 500 immagrants arrive by boat, there is national media coverage on this and the British Public are kept in the dark about who is entering our country illegally via the channel.
attributes.background: I would like parliament to take it seriously and take immediate action against illegal immigrants who are arriving daily in dinghies, escorted safely to our waters by the French Navy. These illegal immigrants have travelled through many safe countries in Europe to get to the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321862
